observation: Home - Relai  Skip to content About Private Business Help 4.6 4.5 Get started Made in Switzerland TAKE YOUR Buy Bitcoin instantly and hold your own keys with ease and simplicity. Join 100,000 others using Relai and start your Bitcoin journey. Rated “Excellent” with 4.4/5 on Trustpilot As seen in Fast Buy Bitcoin instantly using bank transfer, credit cards as well as Apple Pay and Google Pay. Easy Buy and sell Bitcoin with ease and simplicity. No fees, no extra charges. Safe Grow your Bitcoin portfolio in your own non-custodial wallet. Your keys, your coins. Minutes 01 Choose your amount Input the amount of money you want to invest. You can start with as little as 25 EUR/CHF and go all the way up to 1’000 CHF per day and 100’000 CHF per year. 02 Pick your rhythm Select how often you want to purchase Bitcoin. Make a single buy or set up a weekly or monthly auto-invest plan. 03 choose payment method Pick out of bank transfer, credit, or debit card as well as Apple Pay or Google Pay. 04 Confirm and earn Go to your banking app and create a bank transfer if you chose bank transfer. Finish the payment if you picked a different method. Make sure to add your referral code (if you have one). Bitcoin for everyone Relai offers a solution for both beginners and experts Relai Buy Bitcoin instantly and hold your own keys Buy Bitcoin instantly with an easy and simple user interface Pay with bank transfer to credit cards, debit cards or Apple Pay and Google Pay Create auto-invest plans to stack sats on a weekly or monthly basis Learn more Trade large amounts of Bitcoin with personal support Exclusive service for investors looking to trade with large volumes (100k+ CHF) A dedicated single point of contact for all your Bitcoin investment needs Best price and execution via 35+ trading venues Buy Bitcoin as a company with personal support For small to medium-sized businesses who want to add Bitcoin to their balance sheets Expert guidance from the Relai team, a Swiss company focused solely on Bitcoin Acquire Bitcoin in less than 24 hours 0% ZERO-FEE Yes, that’s right: You can buy Bitcoin with 0% fees. Once a month, up to 100 EUR/CHF per order. YOUR KEYS, The Relai app comes with a non-custodial Bitcoin wallet. This gives you, and only you, total control of your Bitcoin. BUY BITCOIN Buy Bitcoin using EUR or CHF without registration. Choose from a wide range of payment options. Auto-Invest Buy Bitcoin automatically every week or every month without the stress of timing the market. observation.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The content is about buying and selling Bitcoin and the website appears to be a legitimate financial service provider in Switzerland fully compliant with regulations.
